waxer 0.0.1.9000

    waxer: Wikimedia Analytics Query Service (AQS) API in R

    • Installation
    • Usage
    • Additional Information

    This is an R wrapper for the Wikimedia Analytics Query Service (AQS). The REST API provides cacheable and straightforward access to Wikimedia content and data, in machine-readable formats. This particular wrapper is for the /metrics endpoint.

    Author: Mikhail Popov (Wikimedia Foundation)
    License: MIT
    Status: In early development

    Installation

    To install the development version:

    # install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("bearloga/waxer")

    Usage

    library(waxer)

?waxer

    Additional Information

    Please note that this project is released with a Contributor Code of Conduct. By participating in this project you agree to abide by its terms.
